value.name: Virtual
value.comment: System user that cannot login but is otherwise treated like a normal user.

entity.name: User
entity.comment: Defines a user of the system.

property.name: Fullname
property.comment: Full name, for display purpose only.

property.name: PasswordHash
property.comment: Password hash. The password itself is not stored.

property.name: ShowEmail
property.comment: Allows system to display user's email to others.

property.name: DefaultRole
property.comment: User's primary role if he his member of more than one.

entity.name: Role
entity.comment: Defines a security role. Roles are associated to permissions (see ACLs).
